channel.title: How do I make "Range XP Rate" In Pimpscape faster?
channel.description:
How do I make "Range" in Pimpscape faster? How do I increase the range xp rate that you get when you click a target? If someone helps me, and it works, you will become a mod in my server called Pur3PkScape. Please help me! Tell me on here or on hamachi or msn please: Hamachi: Pur3PkScape11 Password: pk
MSN: kousinzack92@earthink.net Thank you very much.

item.title: How do I make "Range XP Rate" In Pimpscape faster?
item.dc:creator: @dontaskmemyname dontaskmemyname
item.description:
@dontaskmemyname wrote:

search for case 2513:
and you should see this

case 2513:
case 2514:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You shoot at the target.”);
actionName = “range1”;
actionTimer = 30;
setAnimation(426);
addSkillXP((15playerLevel[4]), 4);
addSkillXP((5playerLevel[18]), 18);
addItem(3272, 1);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

change the
addSkillXP((15playerLevel[4]), 4);
addSkillXP((5playerLevel[18]), 18);

into addSkillXP((1000playerLevel[4]), 4);
addSkillXP((1000playerLevel[18]), 18);
tell me if it works this is plain guesswork =\

seeing that your not online i guess i’ll tell you through msn

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make "Range XP Rate" In Pimpscape faster?
